comprehensive_overview: Perftools lite is a set of performance analysis tools designed for lightweight profiling and tracing of applications. It provides insights into the performance of software applications to help optimize and improve efficiency.
core_features: Perftools-lite offers functionalities such as profiling, tracing, performance analysis, and visualization tools. It includes features like CPU and memory profiling, function-level profiling, heap profiling, thread profiling, real-time tracing, and performance visualization.
